text: aur haj aur umara jo ki allaah ke lie hai, poore karo. phir yadi tum ghir jao, to jo qurabaanee upalabdh ho pesh kar do. aur apane sir na moodo jab tak ki qurabaanee apane thikaane na pahunch jae, kintu jo vyakti tumamen beemaar ho ya usake sir mein koee takaleef ho, to roze ya sadaqa ya qarabaanee ke roop mein fidyaaee dena hoga. phir jab tum par se khatara tal jae, to jo vyakti haj tak umara se laabhaanvit ho, jo jo qurabaanee upalabdh ho pesh kare, aur jisako upalabdh na ho to haj ke dinon mein teen din ke roze rakhe aur saat din ke roze jab tum vaapas ho, ye poore das hue. yah usake lie hai jisake baal-bachche masjide haraam ke nikat na rahate hon. allaah ka dar rakho aur bhalee-bhaanti jaan lo ki allaah kathor dand denevaala hai
